thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com
thread.title: Bert
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Bert

author: Bert
title: Bert
text: NorthShore is just awesome! I placed an order recently and FedEx made a mistake and delivered to the wrong address, I called FedEx and couldn't get it resolved, they claimed that the package was delivered and they pretty much washed their hands on the matter. So I called NorthShore and explained the issue, within 24 hours they shipped the entire order again! This order was over $500 in value and they just reshipped it free of charge. This is incredible customer service if you ask me, way to go NorthShore, you have a loyal customer here for life.
